entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
